summary: Timmy turns 23 and his godparents are fighting to keep him, while Crocker is still up to his nefarious schemes.
cast: Drake Bell|Daniella Monet|Steven Weber|Daran Norris|Randy Jackson|Mark Gibbon|David Lewis|Teryl Rothery|Cheryl Hines|Jason Alexander|Susanne Blakeslee|Tara Strong|Christie Laing|Devon Weigel|Chris Anderson|Jesse Reid|Darien Provost|Olivia Steele Falconer|Qayam Devji|Diego Martinez-Tau|Harrison Houde|Serge Houde|Butch Hartman|Donavon Stinson|Daniel-Ryan Spaulding|Nicola Anderson|Keith Dallas|Lee Tichon|Osmond L. Bramble|Judith Maxie|John Innes|Raugi Yu|Eddie Deezen|Emily Hirst|Arlene Newman-Van Asperen|Kennith Overbey
title: Los padrinos mágicos, la película: ¡Crece, Timmy Turner!
